HomePage.pls_select_a_file_to_edit: Please select a file to edit

file_header.SrcFileName_tip: Source file path; usually not used, but do not leave it empty. The game mainly uses this in error logs (2.41.1). If your game isn't the Japanese version, the game will try to use it to match translations
file_header.ItemName_tip: Item name; not used, but do not leave it empty. The game reads and discards it (2.41.1). The actual item name is specified in the command segment
file_header.Category_tip: Item category; not used, but do not leave it empty. The game reads and discards it (2.41.1). The actual category is specified in the command segment
file_header.SetInfoText_tip: Item description; generally not used, but do not leave it empty. The game typically just reads and discards it (2.41.1). However, in certain cases, if set to 'acctatoo' or 'hokuro', the game will remove accessories in those two slots

MenuEditor.ctrl_space: In tree indentation mode, press `Ctrl + Space` for completion options
MenuEditor.other_shortcuts: For other shortcut keys, refer to the default Monaco Editor shortcuts
MenuEditor.format_tree_tsv_use_tab: Both tree indentation and TSV formats use the `Tab` key for indentation, not spaces
MenuEditor.only_tree_indent_have_autocomplete: Only tree indentation format has auto-completion and prompts

file_header.Name: Remark Name
file_header.Name_tip: Name is for your reference only; the game reads and discards it (2.41.1)
file_header.Material_Name_tip: The game will assign this to material.name, and will attempt to find a .pmat file with the same name to use
file_header.Material_ShaderName_tip: The game attempts to find and use a shader with this name
file_header.Material_ShaderFilename_tip: The game attempts to locate the shader file in a specific path

MateEditor.property_name_tip: The property name; the game sets this as the corresponding property name. For textures, it sets the texture name; for colors, it sets the corresponding texture color; etc.
MateEditor.col_tip: Color (col). The game sets the corresponding texture color to this value
MateEditor.vec_tip: Vector (vec). Essentially a color, but labeled as XYZW instead of RGBA. The game sets the corresponding texture color to this value
MateEditor.tex2dName_tip: 2D texture name; the game will attempt to find and load a .tex file matching this name
MateEditor.tex2dPath_tip: 2D texture path; unused, but do not leave it empty. The game reads and discards it (2.41.1)
MateEditor.unknown_text_1_tip: Unknown Text 1; unused. The game reads and discards it (2.41.1). Possibly related to Render Texture
MateEditor.unknown_text_2_tip: Unknown Text 2; unused. The game reads and discards it (2.41.1). Possibly related to Render Texture

file_header.Hash_tip: Hash; the game calculates this for caching purposes (2.41.1). Whatever is filled in here will be overwritten by the actual calculated hash when saving. Different editors calculate the hash differently, so even if the same value is entered, saving in different editors can lead to different files, possibly preventing full caching and slightly increasing memory usage

PMatEditor.materialName_tip: Must match the material name in the .mate file exactly (2.41.1). The editor includes it in the hash calculation
PMatEditor.renderQueue_tip: The game sets this value as the render order (2.41.1). Larger numbers render later. Typically, the GPU draws layers in order, so those rendered later appear on top of earlier ones. Default range 0 - 5000
PMatEditor.shaderName_tip: Not used by the game itself; the game doesn't even read this field (2.41.1). However, the editor uses it for hash calculation to avoid incorrect render orders when different shaders share the same material name. It's best to fill in the correct shader name

Errors.pls_input_menu_file_path_to_open: Please enter the path of the .menu file to open
Errors.pls_input_file_path_first: Please enter a file path first
Errors.json_root_node_not_array: The JSON root node is not an array
Errors.invalid_path_or_mate_data: Invalid file path or Mate data
Errors.file_type_not_supported: This file type is not currently supported
